casebody.data:
Marion MILLER
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 7, 2017

Vishal K. Garg, in support of the petition.

*86Marjorie Allen Dauster, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Marion Miller's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 901, 151 A.3d 895 (2017), is denied.
